actions.committee: House Committee on Ways and Means
actions.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

official_title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit to employers who employ members of the Ready Reserve or the National Guard.

summary.text: Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide a business tax credit for employers of members of the Ready Reserve or National Guard absent from work on active duty. Limits such credit to $2,000 with respect to any one Ready Reserve-National Guard employee.

titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to provide a tax credit to employers who employ members of the Ready Reserve or the National Guard.
